alert.note: Alert for Beckham; Custer; Dewey; Ellis; Harper; Roger Mills; Woods; Woodward (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 08 at 12:31PM CST until January 09 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 AM CST TUESDAY... ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 6 PM CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the first Wind Advisory, southwest winds 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. For the High Wind Warning, northwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. For the second Wind Advisory, northwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Harper, Woods, Ellis, Woodward, Roger Mills, Dewey, Custer and Beckham Counties. * WHEN...For the first Wind Advisory, until 6 PM CST this evening. For the High Wind Warning, from 6 PM this evening to 6 AM CST Tuesday. For the second Wind Advisory, from 6 AM to 6 PM CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds can blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Local whiteout conditions will be possible this evening with wind-driven snow.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Beckham; Custer; Dewey; Ellis; Harper; Roger Mills; Woods; Woodward
